 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (PorterDuffColorFilter)

Detailed Description

Subclass of ColorFilter for filtering colors with Porter-Duff modes. 

// Create a red color filter with PorterDuff mode DST_ATOP.
ColorFilter* filter = new PorterDuffColorFilter(0xFFFF0000, PorterDuff::Mode::DST_ATOP);
drawer->setColorFilter(filter);
...

Create a colorfilter that uses the specified color and porter-duff mode.

Parameters:
